name: Compare
description: Compares message properties with configured values

property.label: Property
property.description: Property in the message to compare

help.description: Compares a message property with a configured value using various comparison operations. Sends true/false outputs based on the result.

payload.name: payload
payload.description: Message containing the property to compare

details.text: Configure which message property to compare (e.g., msg.payload, msg.temperature).

Select a comparison operation: equal, not equal, less than, less than or equal, greater than, greater than or equal, is true, is false, is empty, is not empty, starts with, ends with, contains, or matches regex.
For most operations, provide a comparison value. For 'is true', 'is false', 'is empty', and 'is not empty', no comparison value is needed.
The node evaluates the comparison and sends the result (true or false) to one of two outputs.
Use with switch nodes or other logical nodes to build complex decision flows.
